body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us! My name is Christian Butler, and I'm a customer service representative at our Car Dealership company.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I kindly ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Samantha Ross.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you, Samantha. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - two two one - four three zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you. And may I also have the email address you used to register with us, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is sross@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Samantha. I will look into the product quality issue at our Car Dealership. I appreciate your time and assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
